p: In regard to adaptive response, it inhibited the proliferation of immune cells, such as Jurkat T cells and lymphocytes, likely through the regulation of the cell cycle, although the true mechanisms remain to be clarified [ 164]. Similar suppressive effects were also highlighted for its synthetic analogue minerval and confirmed in animal models [ 164, 168]. Furthermore, the treatment with oleic acid and minerval induced proapoptotic effects in Jurkat (T lymphocyte) and Raji (B lymphocyte) cells, likely due to mitochondrial depolarization and ROS production [ 168, 169, 170].
